summary: Vanguard is a big American company that helps people invest their money. It was started in 1975 and is now one of the largest investment companies in the world, managing over $9.3 trillion. Vanguard is known for its mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs), which are like big savings jars that many people contribute to. It also offers other financial services. The company was founded by John C. Bogle, who made investing more affordable for regular people. Interestingly, Vanguard is owned by its customers, and it has offices in many places around the globe.
title: The Vanguard Group
